short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A button to quickly add something you've read to your Roundview profile.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Roundview Extension for Chrome - The best way to track and prove all the productive reading you're doing. 

When you've read something on the web, just hit the Roundview button in Chrome and we'll immediately add it to your Roundview profile. 

http://roundview.co
